title: Stones River National Battlefield: Staff Rides
body: Staff Rides          From a brief orientation to a full battlefield tour, park rangers stand ready to help members of the armed forces to learn valuable lessons from the Battle of Stones River. Contact us to schedule a staff ride and use the materials below in addition to other maps and materials found on this site to prepare your group for your visit. You may also request a CD containing staff ride materials prepared by Robert Cameron (Armor Historian at Fort Knox).  Â    Staff Ride Materials (ZIP File - Right click and "Save Target As")
